Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1887564751899979776/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "100% Human Written, SEO Article for Rank"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1887564751899979776/)_"
---
Prompt Description:
Generate an engaging, SEO-optimized article in HTML format. The content should be human-like, conversational, and structured with clear readability. Apply the placeholders as needed to customize the article framework and content.

User Instructions:

Replace [PROMPT] with your article title or main keyword.
Use [TARGETLANGUAGE] to specify the desired output language if not English.
Template:

Article Framework:

Outline Table: [Outline Table with H1, H2, H3, H4 tags]
Article Table: [Article Content Table in Markdown]
Content Development:

Word Count: [Minimum 2500 words]
Headings: [At least 15 headings with H tags]
SEO Optimization: [Integrated keywords, readability, structured flow]
Technical Specifications:

HTML Tags: [Use specific HTML tags for structuring]
Conclusion: [H1 tagged "Conclusion" paragraph]
FAQ Section: [Google's standard FAQ schema]
Call to Action: [Call to action link]
Final Message:

Conclude with a message on the importance of SEO-friendly content creation.
Replace the bracketed sections with the specific requirements or instructions as per your article needs.
PromptHint: [Insert Your Keyword or Blog Title Here]
